acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle Singletons with parameters in the static method
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleSingletonsWithParametersInPublicStaticMethod

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.SingletonWithParametersInStaticFactoryPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the calendar object should not be null
Then the String field AmYpCSDixf cannot be null or empty

Then the List<?> <span class='step-parameter'>[OneDimensionalTestPojo ( booleanField = true booleanObjectField = true byteField = 36 byteObjectField = 122 shortField = 77 shortObjectField = 23 charField = J charObjectField = K intField = 2038914675 intObjectField = -758936257 longField = 847051666094200 longObjectField = 847051665434684 floatField = 0.10870534 floatObjectField = 0.6976514 doubleField = 0.09413799009752033 doubleObjectField = 0.13064265241761341 stringField = 3qs3YBm6MG objectField = java.lang.Object@58ef8069 calendarField = Sun Aug 21 23:35:48 ICT 2016 dateField = Sun Aug 21 23:35:48 ICT 2016 randomArray = [Ljava.util.Random;@14d0e7da intArray = [I@10706411 booleanArray = [Z@29855e88 bigDecimalField = 327544558134 ) should not be null and contain at least one non-empty element

Then the Map<?, ?> <span class='step-parameter'>{XWWuIT5OKW=OneDimensionalTestPojo ( booleanField = true booleanObjectField = true byteField = 42 byteObjectField = 41 shortField = 86 shortObjectField = 35 charField = N charObjectField = 4 intField = -1457130203 intObjectField = 463029246 longField = 847051687427138 longObjectField = 847051686864558 floatField = 0.22550613 floatObjectField = 0.5468866 doubleField = 0.05262337511112469 doubleObjectField = 0.3663185397494263 stringField = ynfkQ6btTL objectField = java.lang.Object@350e34e7 calendarField = Sun Aug 21 23:35:48 ICT 2016 dateField = Sun Aug 21 23:35:48 ICT 2016 randomArray = [Ljava.util.Random;@197115d6 intArray = [I@bf90cf8 booleanArray = [Z@5554cc4 bigDecimalField = 77495411996 ) should contain at least one non empty element
